noun.description: The action or an act of killing a human being; homicide, murder.

adjective.description: That kills or is capable of killing a human being or beings; murderous.

origin: Late Middle English; earliest use found in The Wycliffite Bible (early version). From man + slaying<br>early 17th century; earliest use found in Francis Herring (d. 1628), physician. From man + slaying.
